title._content: Image taken from page 395 of 'The Book of the Poets. (Chaucer to Beattie.) Illustrated with forty-five elegant engravings on steel, from designs by Corbould, &c. With an essay on English poetry'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Book of the Poets. (Chaucer to Beattie.) Illustrated with forty-five elegant engravings on steel, from designs by Corbould, &c. With an essay on English poetry" Contributor: Corbould, H. (Henry) Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11609.ppp.15." Page: 395 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1844 Publisher: William Smith Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000411664 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
